"Oh?\u3000Oh my!!": "Huh?- Uwaaaah! You scared me!"
"Fufufu~ There's no need to be scared, I'm a fully-fledged ARKS you know?"
"No offense but, whether you're ARKS or not, I'm pretty sure anyone would be surprised to find someone standing right behind them."
"If I was in your position, I'd shoot them right away."
"That goes BEYOND being surprised!"
"Fufufu~ Such a naive reaction, feels soo fresh. Is she your new friend?"
"1. I want you to get along with her."
"2. You never change, do you?"
"My oh my~ I won't deny you, but I intend to be friendly and get along with everyone"
"Well, I don't know what others think though."
"Well, of course. Even if it's 2 years, or 100 years even. No matter how long time goes by, people don't change that easily."
"And, who are you, young lady?"
"My name's Hitsugi, the small child is Aru and..."
"I'm not asking for your name. WHO ARE YOU?"
"Umm... Thats-"
"Well, regardless of who you are, if your <%me>'s aquaintance then it's fine. I don't really care."
"Ah... I see."
"How about this?\u3000As a sign of getting close to me, let's go shoot each other~ What do you say?"
"Shooting each other?.. WHAT?- I mean- I don't have those kinds of interests!"
"Hmm... What a shame. I wanted to know what it's like shooting you since it's different from ARKS. What a shame."
"If you ever feel like changing your mind, feel free to call me anytime. I'll be more than happy to shoot you~"
"I might end up shooting you anyways. Fufu~ Fufufu~ Hahahahaha~"
"I know this is absurd but, ARKS sure have alot of weird people around."
"But, somehow that person... I'm abit scared. It felt as if she saw right through us, right Aru?"
"I wasn't scared. In fact, it felt more like kindness."
"Eh?! Did she really feel kind?.."
